name: CMPT315 Final Project
description: This is the final project for CMPT 315. Some of the lighting conditions that were made was making the background darker, changing the skybox intensity, and using particle effects (Fire) that light the scene and the character. In terms of programming moving parts, I have 4 separately moving objects. The first is movement of the sphere reacting to the arrow keys, the second is the camera reacting to the sphere, the third is the horizontal moving platform, and the fourth is the up and down sin wave platforms.
